summary: A CBBE conversion of nsk13s Sotteta Huntress Amor UNP. BBP, TBBP and BodySlideable.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][size=2][b]
The quality of this conversion is very poor, I do not recommend using it, however people still ask to me to reopen it and so I am leaving it here for those who aren't bothered by it's imperfections.[/b][/size]


This is a conversion of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57909/?]Sotteta Huntress Armor UNP[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573/?]nsk13[/url].
For use with CBBE bodies.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61970-2-1422086339.png[/img]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/61970-0-1479866460.png[/img]
[size=5][/size][font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][size=2][b][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font] Requirements [/size][/b][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font][/font]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57909/?]Sotteta Huntress Armor UNP[/url]. [font=Tahoma][size=2]Must be installed first. Override with my mod.[/size][/font]
[size=2]- Caliente's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url] body meshes.[/size]
[size=2]- HDT Heels version requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System[/url].[/size]


[size=5][font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][size=2][b][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font] Acquisition [/size][/b][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font][/font][size=2]
All items can be crafted under the Dragonscale category[/size][/size].
For the recipes to appear at the forge the Sotteta Huntress Crafting Manual must be held [b]in your inventory[/b] at the time of crafting.
A bag containing enough materials to craft one of each item can be found alongside the crafting manual, inside the Drunken Huntsman, Whiterun.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61970-1-1422086339.png[/img]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/61970-0-1479866460.png[/img]

[size=5][font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][size=2][b][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font] Videos [/size][/b][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font][/font][size=2]
VatiWah has reviewed Sotteta Huntress CBBE in episode 26 of Skyrim mod Review - Boobs and Lubes series. Review for this mod starts at 8.43.

[youtube]GCWBxc1Tat4[/youtube]   [/size][/size][youtube]w8UUGQQjAf0[/youtube]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6973202/?]SahVulon[/url] has several adventure video episodes here on the nexus. His latest couple of videos show off Sotteta Huntress in action.
Please take a look at his profile for more videos!

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/61970-0-1479866460.png[/img]
[size=5][font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][size=2][b][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font] Credits [/size][/b][font=Tahoma][size=2][size=2][size=4][b][color=#000000]×[/color][/b][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font][/font][/size]

[font=Tahoma]Original UNP mod and all texture work belong to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573]nsk13[/url].[/font]

[font=Tahoma]Hair meshes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url].[/font]
Armor meshes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection by Tiwa44[/url].
Socks, stockings, trousers, bracers, sandals meshes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]UNP Undies by Petrovich[/url].
Collar mesh [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15529/?]R18Pn Set - Inner Wear Set for UNP and CBBEV3 by NPR[/url].
Boots mesh [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43381/?]Bobs Boots for CBBE and UNP by Beazalbob69[/url].
[font=Tahoma]Panty mesh [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14294/?]Osare Underwear - UNP by anano[/url].[/font]

[font=Tahoma]Huge thanks to the entire team behind [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 & Outfit Studio[/url] - without which this conversion would not have been possible.[/font]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/61970-0-1479866460.png[/img]
This mod is a Nexus exclusive! Please do not upload it anywhere else.[/font][/center]
author: Mitosuke

files.name: Sotteta Huntress - CBBE - No HDT Heels.
files.fileName: Sotteta Huntress - CBBE - No HDT Heels.-59035-1-0.7z

files.name: Sotteta Huntress - CBBE - Main File Glow Fix
files.fileName: Sotteta Huntress - CBBE - Main File Glow Fix-59035-.7z
files.changelogHtml: Added Misc. files for glow fix. Reduced glow values for ENB's that cause bright white glows off of the armor. Available for Main File, BBP and TBBP. Not compatible with BodySlide files.
